coded_answer.p: Referring to the won competitioncompetition I won, I would like sayto say that I am very happy to be the firstwinner. Accordingly I will give you the further information that you wanted.
First, you asked abutabout the travel timewhen I would like to travel and the only possible time for me is in July, because my company only gave me holidaysholiday time in this period.
Second, I prefer accommodationto stay in a tent. I want to feel the real nature and spirit of Camp California.

Further moreFurthermore, I should choose between two activities and say how good I am at each one. I choose singing and surfing, - singing because I am a singer in a band and I hope to make my voice more perfect and surfing because I have never surfsurfed and I want to learn tohow.

Finally, I have some questions. I would like knowto know what type of clothes I should bring with me? How much money should I take with me? Is it possibleCan I to traveltravelcome with a friend of mine?

How are you? I hope you're fine. Me,I am fine, because ofI have been helping at the concert called 'The Dome'. I can say that this was one of the best experiences of my life. First I havehad helpto help to cookmake coffee and makeprepare food for popular peoplepop stars like Mariah Carey, Elton John, Backstreet Boys, Echt ectetc... Before and after the concert the "stars" arewere very hungry and I havehad serveto serve them food, drinks and something like this. Kim, check it in your mind, I have had nearclose contact with Mariah Carey! I am so happy about it. Different "stars" gave me signaturesautographs and talktalked really nicenicely and normalnormally with me. At the time the concert was runningDuring the concert I cleaned the kitchen and the room where the "stars" ate. The after showafter-show dinner party was very nice and I have never thought that popular peoplepop stars like Elton John dancesdance on the table if hethey likeslike the music and if hethey have madehad a great show on stage. It was just great and after this event I can say that popular peoplepop stars are normal humans like everyone you're!
